summary: 1981  was a common year starting on Thursday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1981  was a common year starting on Thursday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1981st year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 981st year of the 2nd millennium, the 81st year of the 20th century, and the 2nd year of the 1980s decade.
